author: costin
msg: Increased sleep period, give tomcat time to start

author: costin
msg: - build-test.xml will be used to build tests ( later )

author: rubys
msg: Fix ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException in JspReader which occurs when there
is no space preceeding the end tag of an include directive.
I ran the watchdog jsp test suite before and after this fix and detected
no regressions as a result of this fix.

author: costin
msg: - changed tomcat.sh to "guess" TOMCAT_HOME ( or load it from .tomcatrc)
and "cd" if no server.xml is in the current dir ( in order to be
able to start tomcat without the annoying cd )
- first param to runtest.sh will be the port - to be able to test
